description: rectangular building with pumpkin accents; three tall windows left side and two on right side; short one level projections at corner and on right end; \"BUREAU\" above door; elaborate light fixture hanging by chains from scrolled brackets right side; names of pioneers in electricity around top edge of building; \"USINE ELECTRIQUE\" vertically below light on facade
